# Research

*PhD Student, Gremer Laboratory, University of California, Davis* \hfill 2019-present

> Researching plant defense and life history strategy evolutionary responses to climate gradients and environmental variation using phylogenetic analytical techniques.

*Undergraduate Research Assistant, Mason Laboratory, University of Central Florida* \hfill 2017-2019

> Collected trait data of dry *Cornus* fruit and floral samples from a common garden setting using phytochemical assays and conducted data analysis on fruit and floral defense, fruit nutritional content, and natural environmental traits using phylogenetical comparative methods.
